translations: v.（使）正常化；（使）恢复友好状态

sentences.sentence: Normalises sebum production, restores vitality to dry, damaged hair.
sentences.translation: Normalises皮脂生产，恢复生机，干燥，受损的头发。

sentences.sentence: It feeds our ego but it also normalises what is still very new behaviour.
sentences.translation: 这助长了我们的自负，但也使某些新的行为变得正常。
